text.en:
Here I am,
dreaming once more
text.ga:
Anseo atá mé,
ag taidhbhreadh 
arís

text.en: in the depths of my imagination
every street, every corner, familiar, distant
text.ga:
gach sráid, 
gach cúinne,
cairdiúil, sia

text.en:
I walk this town 
in peace when
text.ga:
siúlaim an baile seo
 i suain núair

text.en:
I see the sparks
as from flint 
of a horses hoofs on the road

Call the wind
and buckle up
text.ga:
Glaoigh ar an 
ngaoth agus
marcaigh an púca
